title: Still Life with View of Lake Geneva
provenance: Le Corbusier (Charles Edouard Jeanneret-Gris), prior to 1936
medium: Graphite on white paperboard, mounted on canvas
description: Vertical drawing of a view of Lake Geneva.  Terrace in the foreground.
name: Drawing
